item.title: What's New in Retype v3.10
item.description: We're excited to share the latest release of Retype, packed with features that make documentation more flexible and powerful.
item.author: geoff@retype.com (@geoffreymcgill)

item.title: What's New in Retype v3.9
item.description: Retype v3.9 brings improvements to callout components, broader syntax features to support other systems, enhanced image handling, and better print...
item.author: geoff@retype.com (@geoffreymcgill)

item.title: What's New in Retype v3.8
item.description: Retype v3.8 introduces powerful new linking capabilities, enhanced search functionality, and improved content management features.
item.author: geoff@retype.com (@geoffreymcgill)
